trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Portland
There were no other sightings in Portland on or around March 17th 2013
Summary: Low-floating round object glowing yellow/orange hovered with a few bobbing actions for about 3 minutes. Floated SE direction before it disappeared as if extinguished.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: sighting detailsmy partner and i saw an "unidentified flying (more like floating) object tonight. it was a low floating roundish object slowly traveling south east which was observable with the naked eye for about 3 minutes. appeared to be glowing with a yellow\orange flame color before extinguishing. a balloon on fire is the best description i can come up with. my girlfriend managed to shoot a phone image of the moon and the object in one frame(moon on top right) and when magnified the colors around the object show the yellow\orange coloration (unlike the moon which still radiates only white light).see attached pictures.
